title: 请大家整合一个整合包
author: 企鹅飞
txt_content:
需要http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=182854&extra=page%3D6%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B144%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DR%26searchoption%5B144%5D%5Btype%5D%3D%26searchoption%5B147%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B26%5D%3D26%26searchoption%5B147%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox%26searchoption%5B151%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B4%5D%3D4%26searchoption%5B151%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox%26searchoption%5B152%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B2%5D%3D2%26searchoption%5B152%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox的mod，要以下modIndustrialCraft2 Experimental(工业2实验版)
BuildCraft(建筑)Foresty(林业)还有optifine和API并且工业2实验版，建筑，林业有扩展的要扩展，版本：1.6.2
